column4: how can setup a samba share from my ubuntu with username and password so i can access it on windows?
help: how can setup a samba share from my ubuntu with username and password so i can access it on windows?
help: how can setup a samba share from my ubuntu with username and password so i can access it on windows?
as far as i know, you can do this on ubuntu by right-clicking want you want to share and selecting "share"
